item_descriptions.corn_seed: Plant corn seeds to grow corn crops. Each seed costs 8 coins.
item_descriptions.potato_seed: Potato seeds for growing potatoes. Buy for 5 coins.
item_descriptions.blueberry_seed: Blueberry seeds for blueberry crops. Price: 12 coins.
item_descriptions.plot: Purchase additional land plots to expand your farm. Price varies by plots owned.
item_descriptions.water_tank: Buy water tanks to store water for irrigation. Each tank costs 25 coins.
item_descriptions.hen: Purchase a hen that lays eggs. One-time cost of 50 coins.
item_descriptions.pet: Buy a pet pug for your farm. Special achievement item costing 250 coins.
item_descriptions.corn: Harvest and sell corn crops. Each corn sells for 8 coins.
item_descriptions.potato: Sell harvested potatoes. Each potato sells for 5 coins.
item_descriptions.blueberry: Sell blueberry crops. Each blueberry sells for 12 coins.
item_descriptions.egg: Sell eggs produced by your hen. Each egg sells for 3 coins.
